title: Update demo user credentials to bryanbarton45@gmail.com / alinalaura@24

requirements.text: Update the pre-seeded demo user in the email/password authentication hook (useEmailPasswordAuth.ts) so that the demo account email is 'bryanbarton45@gmail.com' and the password is 'alinalaura@24'. Remove or replace any previously seeded demo credentials that differ from these values.

quotes: lets make the email address bryanbarton45@gmail.com and the password should be alinalaura@24

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to the login page and entering email 'bryanbarton45@gmail.com' with password 'alinalaura@24' results in a successful login.
The previously seeded demo email (if different) no longer grants access.
Incorrect email or password still shows an appropriate error message.

constraints: Do not modify any files listed under frontend.immutablePaths.
Do not change any other demo user data (name, balance, transactions) beyond the email and password credentials.
nonGoals: Adding a new registration flow or changing registration logic.
Modifying backend authentication or Motoko actor.
